responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "AC28473F48BCB8ADD810F59DB751F85A", "My studies have shown that there are varying levels of curses placed upon these soldiers. Without having samples of each, I can\'t be sure if my rite will be potent enough to cleanse the curses from them. You should collect some of each and return to me. We will then work to purge this corrupted magic and put these poor soldiers to rest.")
name: DialogueResponse_6064631601492066311
